text: Alan Gerald Sieroty (December 13, 1930 â€“ March 16, 2024) is an American Democratic politician. He was born in Los Angeles. He was a member of the California Assembly from 1967 to 1977 and of the California Senate from 1977 through 1982. Sieroty died March 16, 2024. ==References== ==Other website== *Join California Alan Sieroty Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
